thread.title: The Bidding for "The Ultimate Evil" Historical Items Auction has begun Online
thread.title_full: The Bidding for "The Ultimate Evil" Historical Items Auction has begun Online - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The Bidding for "The Ultimate Evil" Historical Items Auction has begun Online
text:
J. Sugarman Auction Corp
HOLLYWOOD, Fla. , Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- " The Ultimate Evil" historical items auction has begun. Online bidding is Open from now until the Sunday, October 11th when the Live bidding will take place at 12277 SW 55 th Street, Cooper City, Florida 33330. Preview is Thursday, Friday and Saturday at the location from 10:00am until 4:00pm . Live bidding preview starts at 9:30 am , the Live Bidding starts at 12pm EST . Online bidders will be able to bid with the Live bidders and watch through streaming video.
J. Sugarman Auction Corp is conducting the auction of 100's of historical artifacts. These artifacts come from several Evil cultures including items from the German Nazi's Era, America's Ku Klux Klan Movement and items from Serial Killers. It is important to note: Our firm, the owner, and staff would like to make it clear that we do not in any way endorse, condone, agree with, or wish to glorify the acts and people that committed these awful crimes. J. Sugarman Auction Corp has been asked to sell these items strictly as Historical Record. We hope that the people that buy these items are using them for the greater good - such as to help the police, prosecutors, detectives, criminologists and psychologists to help understand the criminal mind and possibly prevent further hideous crimes.
We are selling items from several individual collections. The items amassed come from thousands of hours of researching to locate these rare and EVIL items. The items include:
Nazi Movement Artifacts:
Medals, Pins, Swords, Daggers, Ceremonial Helmets, Gas Chamber Valves, Nazi Flags, Iron Cross, SS Uniform Medallions and well over (100) Nazi Articles, Concentration Camp Arm Bands, Photos.
Klu Klux Klan Artifacts:
Klu Klux Klan Uniforms, Member Cards, Enclave Podiums, Belt Buckles, Carrying Cards, Confederate Flags, Pins, Dolls, Robes, Voting Figures.
Serial Killer Artifacts:
John Wayne Gacy Paintings, Letters and Correspondence, Charles Manson Self Portrait, Letters from Charles Manson Girl Lynette Squeaky Fromme, Meyer Lansky's Accounting Ledger, Osama Bin Laden Wanted Posters, Ted Bundy Letters .
"In all my years in the Auction Business I have never touched any item and felt the evil in the item as I do when I place these items in my hands," says Scott Grasso President of J. Sugarman Auctions. He goes on to say, "When I touched the Nazi gas valve, I felt pure evil it almost made me sick."
The most valuable item in the sale is a collection of never before seen Ted Bundy Letters . The collection consists of (3) Bundy hand written letters plus letters from a priest who befriended Bundy and was lobbying on his behalf to have the death penalty changed to life imprisonment. The letters include correspondence to Ronald Reagan , Bob Martinez and many more.
These items can be viewed at www.JaySugarman.com .
Online Bidding has started and will culminate on Sunday October 11 th at 12pm EST .
Preview: Thursday, Friday and Saturday from 10:00am until 4:00pm . Sunday from 9:30am until the Auction Starts at 12pm EST .
The auction location is 12277 SW 55 th St Cooper City, Florida 33330.
Online bidding is available as well as Live Streaming while Auction is being conducted at www.Proxibid.com/Sugarman .
Mike Frost 954-547-4128 or
Scott Grasso 954-965-7950 or 954-464-3434
scott@jaysugarman.com
President J. Sugarman Auction
www.JaySugarman.com
